ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars RPG - Death to the Nutrinos!
ygData.msgSnippet: (Ok, I ve learned more about my vacation, and I ll be leaving for a plane possibly before 6 PM or so, Pacific Standard Time, cause the plane leaves around

Subject: Neo Beast Wars RPG - Death to the Nutrinos!
To: Nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Ok, I've learned more about my vacation, and I'll be leaving for a plane 
possibly before 6 PM or so, Pacific Standard Time, 'cause the plane leaves 
around 8:00 PM or so on the 8th, which is Saturday, which is today)

Koga Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor/The Oblitercons/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Punch/Scattershot/Ramhorn/Chordate/Smokescreen/Manterror/Injector/
Double Punch:



Nemesis saw on the main view screen only a few Maximals had backed down.  He 
activated the intercom once more.  "Since only some of you Maximals have 
complied, I give you one more chance.  Back off, or I will execute the 
prisoners and show it to you via hologram."

Nemesis turned to Firestorm.  "Take a place at communications.  I want to be 
notified if the Maximals respond via com."

Punch took out his plasma cannon, taking position a meter behind the other 
Alliance members.  "I will guard the bridge then while you work."

"Good for you, Heidi!" Scattershot yelled with a mad chuckle.

---

(Sorry, IR, in a previous post when IR met up with the energy bars, my 
Oblitercon characters moved 8 ft away from the prisoners so they couldn't be 
grabbed.  Of course, if IR can reach that far PLEASE tell me.  I don't want 
you to die of complete boredom)

Dark One saw IR moving.  "Simmer down!" he yelled, raising his plasma rifle 
into the air, firing a bolt off into the cieling, an autogun coming down, 
scanning for intruders.  It only detected Iron Raptor and Tavatron, but went 
back into the cieling after its scanners detected them behind energy bars.

Hiss chuckled.  "There are only two ways your getting out of here, scum bag!  
On your feet like a warrior, or in a black plastic bag!"

The Oblitercons chuckled.

====

Koga Shuko saw the burned out ship that was the Ark.  "How that idiot Liono 
let this place collapse into nothing!  Onward, my forces!  Take no prisoners!"

Koga Shuko took out his laser rifle, firing two bolts off at the Ark.

Unitron fired two bolts from the two rifles he had in his hands, a total of 
four digging at the Ark's hull plating.

Anubis took out his plasma rifle, firing off three plasma bolts at the Ark.

Hades lifted his missile launcher, firing a rocket off near the bridge of the 
Ark, 15 ft away.

Serpentor charged forward, firing several bolts from his plasma rifle at the 
Ark, an energy blade in the other hand.

---

"What the slag!?" Ramhorn cried out as he felt the Ark shake.  "By the 
Matrix, this is getting REALLY old, REALLY qucik." the activated his com, 
hoping it was strong enough to reach Tigerhawk. 

"Hey, Tigerhawk, I just *hate* to interrupt ou taking all the troops from 
protecting the Ark and attacking the Alliance, but the Ark is under attack!  
AGAIN!  Get your worthless skid plates over here fast!

---

Smokescreen slammed into a wall in a corridor of the Ark.  "Wow!  Deja vu!" 
the robot took out his electro-disruptor rifle, heading for the main entryway 
of the Ark.

===

Chordate checked the scanners.  "Great!  Now we have...Predacons attacking 
the Ark.  Well, I'm not doing anything about it!  They can all go to the 
Matrix for all I care.  I tell you what..."

===

Beeline, Double Punch's cyberbee, entered his left pincher.  "Let's go, we've 
learned all we can for now." 

Double Punch, Manterror, and Injector headed back for the Predacon base.
